name: Little Red Makes Bread Now
description:
Ooooh, is that bread? I think Little Red's gonna make some bread y'all...

a game made in/with/for jam (Fortnightly Fiction Jam)

writing and narrative by Havilah McGinnis 

assistance and engineering by Chris McGinnis

All good art assets courtesy of Pixabay users:

Clker-Free-Vector-Images - https://pixabay.com/users/clker-free-vector-images-3736/

GDJ - https://pixabay.com/users/gdj-1086657/

Gorkhs - https://pixabay.com/users/gorkhs-268986/

OpenClipart-Vectors - https://pixabay.com/users/openclipart-vectors-30363/
